about_the_game: Be noticed when you roll up on the dragway in this metallic gold team design featured in the Moonshot Pack.  You'll own this Funny Car, Driver's Suit, Vehicle Hauler, and Parachute each featuring this mirror-like design.  This beast will cast a reflection of everything it passes including the hyper-blur of the finish line as you blast across it at more than 300 mph.  With each victory, further customize the Funny Car and Vehicle Hauler with the in-game sponsors you'll attract.
detailed_description: Be noticed when you roll up on the dragway in this metallic gold team design featured in the Moonshot Pack.  You'll own this Funny Car, Driver's Suit, Vehicle Hauler, and Parachute each featuring this mirror-like design.  This beast will cast a reflection of everything it passes including the hyper-blur of the finish line as you blast across it at more than 300 mph.  With each victory, further customize the Funny Car and Vehicle Hauler with the in-game sponsors you'll attract.

fullgame.name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed For All

name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All - Moonshot Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 7400 @ 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 2700 X @ 3.7GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Be noticed when you roll up on the dragway in this metallic gold team design featured in the Moonshot Pack.
